attributes.additional_details:
Lower the ages as I and loads of others feel it’s necessary to lower the age to 18.
We feel once you’ve hit the legal age as an adult us as women should be allowed to have smear tests once we hit 18
attributes.background: Lower the age for smear tests to 18 years old instead of 25

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631905
